Dialog: "TODAY CATS AND KITTENS ON THE SAM RIDDLE SHOW, ON BOSS RADIO, WE'RE FEATURING THE MUSIC OF AMERICA'S NUMBER ONE ROCK AND ROLL GROUP, THE MOSQUITOES!"
Gilligan will you stop that!!
You...re a grouch.
OOWWW! Gilligan you've had it!  Now will you get out of here!!
Thurston, do you think we're having a nightmare?
Together with our eyes open? Even Sigmond Freud never dreamt of rock and roll!
I wonder what it could be?
Oh some...that fool.  Playing the radio loud! EIGHT o'clock in the morning!  AAHH!!
First I'll break the radio and then I'll kill Gilligan! No! I'll kill Gilligan and THEN I'll break the radio!
Gilligan!
Gilligan!
GILLIGAN!!
I sorely miss the sweet sounds of civilization...But there's one sound that I don't miss, and that's the Ya Ya Ya of the Mosquitoes.  Now turn off that infernal machine at ONCE!
It's a matter of taste MR. Howell.
AAAHHH taste!
Oh it's a matter of taste...If you don't want to taste that radio, turn it OFF Gilligan!!
There it's off!
Well I said turn it OFF!
It's off it's off!
It IS off! Where's that music coming from!?
The lagoon!
The lagoon!
Lagoon!!
Don't look now man but I think we're surrounded by savages.
Savages? Man the Savages record for Safari Records!
Boy are we glad to see you!
I can't believe it, we've been rescued!
I can't believe it either!  It's the Mosquitoes my favorite musical group!
I thought you said we were going to get away from our fans!
Yeah you said this island was deserted, and we'd be all alone!
Now how did I know it was inhabited? That helicopter pilot told me this place was out of sight man!
We MUST be way out!  Get a load of these characters!
Allow me to introduce myself. I am Thurston Howell the third...millionaire, personal advisor to the Bolshoi Ballet and Lawrence Welk. You sir look like Attila the Hun or a Yale man!
Allow me to introduce MY group...
You don't have to do that.  Everyone know the Mosquitoes! That's Bingo, Bango, Bongo and Irving.

Irving?  Oh well...well never mind. Look, I'm the skipper of the SS MINNOW and we've been ah...shipwrecked here for a long long time and we've been waiting for somebody like yourselves to come along and rescue us!
Well I'll tell you what we'll do commodore.  If your group will cooperate with the Mosquitoes, we'll get you off the island.
Good heavens!  If we had to be rescued by musicians, why couldn't it have been the New York Philharmonic!? Really your trousers!
So that's what's happened to our civilization since we've been gone.
Yeah they're the Mosquitoes, I've got a collection of all their albums!
Ah!  Worthwhile hobby nature boy!
Interesting!  Very very interesting! Whatever they are? See you later Gilligan.
Yeah professor.
Ginger come on!
OOHHH the Mosquitoes!!!
PLEASE! No physical contact!
Oh Ginger!  Hurry up!
Hey who is this Ginger?  Mrs. Money bags?
No that's Mrs. Howell.  Ginger is a...well she's kind of like well...she's kind of like a girl you know she's kind of...
What's going on?
Like you said...Ginger's a girl!
I'll get Mrs. Howell.
Oh...welcome to the island!
They are cute! And will you look at that hair! How would you like to run your finger's through that!?
Oh fingers!? I could go in up to my elbows!
Please!  Please! Bingo!
Back! Back! Don't handle the merchandise huh!
Ginger ah one of them is tall and one of 'em's is short, one of 'em's blond and one of 'em's is dark!
Yeah! A smorgasbord!
Down girls! Down!
Peace and quiet!  That's all we want is peace and quiet!  We came here to get away from girls!
There you are!  Thurston said you needed haircuts.
Split man!  It's the Barber of Seville!
Skipper!?  Skipper, have I got some good news for you!
It certainly is a good day for it Gilligan!
The Mosquitoes are going to give us just what we've been waiting for!
You bet!  A nice trip home!
No guess again.
Guess again?
They're gonna give us a concert!
A concert?  Wa...wa...well who wants a concert now?  We want to go home!
Should I go tell 'em?
No, wait a minute Gillian. Maybe you better not tell 'em, we don't want to get 'em upset.  We'll listen to their concert and THEN we'll go home!
I'll bet we're the luckiest people alive!
We certainly are! We're finally being rescued!
No!  I mean about the Mosquitoes giving us a concert!
Oh well certainly yes.
Here let me help you.
Oh I just adore concerts! I do wish the Mosquitoes would stop tuning up and start the music.
They have stopped tuning up.  That IS the music!
Oh dear...OH DEAR Thurston, then we'd better hurry!  They probably won't seat us in the middle of the first act!  Come on darling!
I wish we could be that LUCKY that we wouldn't be seated at ALL!
Don't bug me, please just let me be...girl Don...t bug me, let my heart be free Go on now Don't bug me, please just let me be...girl

One...two...three... He's a looser Pay no mind to what he says He's a looser He's got rocks in both his hands He's a looser He can't win can't place or show He's a looser And you know how much I hate to say... I told you so I told you so I told you so Trouble follows in his path The path that he's bad news Let him go don't call him back He's likely gonna loose He's a looser Call him anything you choose He's a looser If raced himself he'd loose He's a looser Always stops when he says go He's a looser And you know how much I hate to say... I told you so I told you so I told you so I told you so
Well that's it for tonight!  I wanna tell ya, ya been a good group.  And that a...we're sure our next month here on the island is gonna be just too much.  Thanks, good night.
Did he say another month!?
Well don't they realize we'll miss the opera season!?
Well I'm all packed!
Well what are you smiling at Mr. Howell?
What's wrong Thurston darling?
He's been looking that way throughout the concert Mrs. Howell.
Maybe there's more to this tuneless discord than I can comprehend?
Maybe he developed an ear for rock and roll?
Oh he's got his earplugs in. Thurston take them out.
TAKE THEM OUT!
The concert's over dear.
Oh...oh oh the concerts...wonderful marvelous just just absolutely thrilling thrilling encore!
Well here's something you'll get a thrill out of Mr. Howell.  We're going to be here for another month!
Yeah, and they'll probably give concert after concert after concert!
Oh good heavens! My ear plugs!
Skipper? Are you sleeping?
No Gilligan I'm still listening to the music!
Yeah so am I!  Isn't it wild?
Wild?
Gilligan I hope I NEVER get that rich.
We'll have to be very very quiet if we want 'em to stay here on the island.
Certainly little buddy, I'll walk around on tippy toes!
That's why they came to the island.  To find peace and quiet, and if they don't get it, they might as well go back to the states.
Never mind Gilligan.
That's it! THAT...S IT! Gilligan!  You've done it again little buddy!
Oh that's great!  I did it again! What did I do?
The Mosquitoes!
The Mosquitoes??!!
AAAHHHHH!!!
What was that!
I don't know. What's happening!?
I don't know!
I just love 'em!!
It's so groovy!! MARY ANN I have to have a souvenir!!
I want it!!
Hey my guitar! Look what you've done to my guitar!
I want his pajamas!!
I want one too!
Bingo Help!!
That's enough! Enough girls!  You girls have had your fun now...DOC give us a hand will ya!?
Ah later! Ah Mr. Bongo I should like to conduct an experiment.  Now these electrodes will test your brain waves when you play.
Ah! DOC no! Your not gonna make any Frankenstein out of me!
It won't hurt.  It will just take a moment.
Here's the one I like!  The strong silent type!
Yike!!
Oh come on Irving!
Oh boy a party!
Could you autograph these coconuts for me please?
Do WHAT?!
This is ridiculous! This is ridiculous! Call off Mrs. money bags!
All right it's time for your exercises! Deep knee bends!
That's the thing, deep knee bends!
Gather around, gather around! Wait a minute! Wait a minute! As your new manager I have something to say.
Oh no not you too!
really big!  Concerts, one night stands, movies, television...
THAT DOES IT!!  I mean it!  That really does it!  We're leaving tomorrow!  Come on fellas lets get out of here.
Did you here what they said! We're leaving tomorrow!!
We're leaving tomorrow! We're leaving tomorrow! We're leaving tomorrow!
We're leaving tomorrow! We're leaving tomorrow! We're leaving tomorrow! We're leaving tomorrow...
Hurry up Gilligan!
Ok. Bingo and Bango! We're ready to leave!
Bongo?
Irving?
Irving...
Well at least he could pluck.
Is anybody home?!
Oh no! Gilligan they've...they've gone! They've gone without us!
But they couldn't they just couldn't!
Mr. Howell they have!
Couldn't what darling?
The Mosquitoes couldn't leave the island without us.
Well of course they couldn't!
They already have!
They did?! HHAAAAA Well in that case there's only one thing left to do.  Get ready Thurston.
Yes dear.
Hey...Hey have you seen the autograph that Bango gave me!?  See the X see!
Yes we've seen it Gilligan!
I must admit that I underestimated the reaction that would set in.
Oh professor we should've kept an eye on 'em!
You just don't understand 'em skipper.  They're a high strung nervous type.  I mean being sensitive musicians...
Never mind that Gilligan.
Gilligan will you turn that radio off!
What radio?
It's not around here skipper.
Well how come I hear music?
They didn't go!
We...we still got a chance of being rescued!
I'll go tell the others!
Let's go Gilligan!!
Boy are we glad to see you fellas!
We thought you left the island without us!
The word Bingo the word!
Yah!
Now look fellas...we're the friendly type you know...and we'd like to remain the friendly type.  But we need rest!
But we can't help it if we're your fans!
FANS!! The word Bingo the word!
All right men now hear this...we're not splitting from this island for two months!
Two Months!!
Maybe longer! That crazy scene last night wound us up tighter than Presley's pants!
Bu...but...but fellas you are going to take us with you aren...t you?
Yeah when we give the word then we'll all move out!
That sounds fair.
AAAHHHHH!!
Don't go away! Don't go away from me!
AAAHHHHH!!
Don't go away, I just want to cut your hair with these nail scissors!
And please take Delilah with you!
Got any queens?
Fish! I can't stand it any longer Gilligan that music is driving me crazy!
Yeah it's too much isn't it?  It's called "I want to go back to Pago Pago Pago Ya Ya Ya with you".
Two months! In two months Gilligan I'm going from a deserted island to an isolation ward!  A padded cell...
Did we wake you up Mr. Howell?
No I was only half asleep I lost one of my earplugs. Any of you happen to find it?
No we haven't seen it Mr. Howell!!
Maybe one of the Mosquitoes found it.
Well I'm afraid to ask them they're so touchy!
What's the matter skipper?

Oh Gilligan supposing we do stay on our side on the island...mind our own business for two months.  I mean how do we know they're not going to change their minds.  They disappeared once before they...they'd probably go off without us again!
Good grief you're right, the Mosquitoes might buzz off without us!
Oh they wouldn't do that.
Oh Gilligan for goodness sakes...we're not dealing with regular people, we're dealing with musicians!  They're in a world of their own!
Yeah I guess you're right.  Show people just like show people.
By George Gilligan...you have done it again! Amazing!
Oh boy I did it again!  I sure wish I knew what I keep doing.
Do you think it'll work?
Oh I'm sure it will.  All headliners want an opening act that'll make them look good!
That's right Ginger!  I mean we'll get up an act...We'll rehearse with them and everything...and we'll make them...look so good that they're bound to take us with 'em!
What act? Who...how?
Well you three! You're going to sing together!
Wa...well what about the professor?
Wa...well him too!
You mean we're going to have our own singing group?
Uh-huh!
Well this is almost too much!  I'm in showbiz! I'll be forever excluded from the Harvard club!
Oh your pants look great Gilligan how do they feel?
Like Alligator skin...on an Alligator!
Oh well they have to be tight all the musicians wear them like that.  So they can do the Watusi while they're playing.
The Watusi!  I can hardly walk around in 'em!
Oh great...come on!  It's really great come on!
All right I'll try it. No I'd better not.
Gilligan! Oh Gilligan I've got your wig all ready!
What do you know...instant hair!
Put it on darling.
How do I look?
Oh it looks just perfect! Except for one thing. You need a haircut!
Oh no Mrs. Howell! No! No!
But he does need a haircut!  His bangs are too long!  His bangs are way too long.
Excuse me Mrs. Howell. Here are the drums.  Now I have to work on the guitars.  Here are the sticks.
OOOOO!
Oh boy, now Gilligan see if you can play and Watusi at the same time.
Ok.
Great!
Whoops!  OOHHH!
One...two...two...three...four...five
Skipper, all we need is a little more practice.
Oh Gilligan, the Mosquitoes thought we were awful.
Oh boy, a little bit of criticism and you fall apart.  You can't start from the top you know!
Gilligan, I'll start from the top of your head and put you in the ground like a thumbtack!
Remember the show must go on!
Gilligan will you please be quiet.  I'm trying to think of another plan.
Won't you try it just once more?
You just don't seem to understand do ya! No! No! No!
You got it skipper but it goes Ya, Ya, Ya, Ya...
Ya, Ya, ya...Hey Ginger?
Huh?
Your in showbiz, tell me honestly...how were we?
Gilligan that act couldn't get booked on Devil's Island.
Oh maybe if we picked a new song.
I don't know how to put this Gilligan but a...you were terrible.
Boy for somebody who doesn't know how to put it!
I'm sorry, I mean...
My grandmother always use to say...Never criticize anybody else unless you could do better yourself!
That's it!  That's it...you've done it again!
I don't know what I'm doing, but I sure as heck keep doing it!
Now a trio with a really really big future.  The girls with a...with a new sound, and here they are the Honeybees.
You need us You need us Like a clam needs a shell Like a prisoner needs a cell Like a ding-dong...Needs a bell You need us.
You need me You need me Like a picture needs a star Like a golfer needs a par Like teenagers...mm mm...Need a car You need me
You need me You need me Like a baby needs a toy Like Hawaiians need their poi Like a girly...Needs a boy You need me
You need a me You need me Like a diamond needs a ring Like a harp needs a string Like a Queen...Needs a King You need me
You need us You need us Like a Bee needs it's Buzz Like a Peach needs it's fuzz So that's why You need You need us Bzzzzzzzzzzz
Thanks for the autograph's girls.  I tried to get Mrs. Howell's, but Mr. Howell was charging a dollar a piece for 'em.
Gilligan will you finish packing!
I can hardly wait to get back to our car.  We're double parked you know!
Oh yes and we left the engine running.
Come on let's go down to the beach.
Ok.
Hold it hold it you can all just start to unpack!
UNPACK!!  What do you mean unpack!?
The Mosquitoes left us a message.
A message?
They can write?
Apparently.
Hi gang.  Me and the boys...
Me and the boys decided to take off this morning when the helicopter came by with provisions.  As for the Honey Bees...
As for the Honeybees!?
As for the Honeybees your good gals...just a little too good and we've got enough competition.  But so there wouldn't be any hard feelings we left a gift for you.
A gift!? Oh I love presents!
Oh never mind that Gilligan.  Well what is it?  Open it up!
I'm trying to skipper!
An album?!
Yeah the Mosquitoes at Carnegie Hall.  Is that all?
Well NOW what do think of your Mosquitoes?!
You're absolutely right!  It was a terrible thing to do.  Leaving us with an album...and they didn't even autograph it!
Gilligan!
If the world is lucky we'll NEVER get rescued!
